tool_description: Covering approximately 40,000 zip codes, our API delivers precise average last and first frost dates for locations across the United States. Seamlessly plan agricultural and gardening activities with tailored frost date insights, optimizing your strategies for every geographic zone
name: US First and Last Frost Dates
title: US First and Last Frost Dates
tool_name: US First and Last Frost Dates

api_list.name: Get Frost Dates By Zipcode
api_list.description: Retrieve average first and last frost dates for a specific US zipcode. Obtain precise data on the range of days and corresponding months for both the first and last frost occurrences in the specified location
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://us-first-and-last-frost-dates.p.rapidapi.com/frost-dates/zipcodes/00501"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-first-and-last-frost-dates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://us-first-and-last-frost-dates.p.rapidapi.com/frost-dates/zipcodes/{zipcode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "us-first-and-last-frost-dates.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
